elements.name: csdpilot_discuss_with_peers_m56
elements.title: I had opportunities to discuss CS Discoveries course implementation roadblocks and successes with peers during this module.

elements.name: better_prepared_unit6csd_m56
elements.title: I feel prepared to teach Unit 6 after attending this workshop.

elements.name: better_prepared_unit7csp_m56
elements.title: I feel prepared to teach Unit 7 (I feel prepared to teach concepts such as parameters, arguments and libraries).

elements.name: better_prepared_unit8csp_m56
elements.title: I feel prepared to teach Unit 8 (I feel prepared to teach concepts such as privacy and security, and global impact).

elements.name: better_prepared_unit8csp_project_m56
elements.title: I feel prepared to guide students through the project in Unit 8.

elements.name: csp_ap_exam_multiplechoice_m56
elements.title: I know how and when to prepare students for the multiple-choice section of the AP exam.

elements.name: opportunities_discuss_peers_m56
elements.title: I had opportunities to discuss teaching strategies with peers during this module.

elements.name: csdpilot_confidence_cs_concepts_m56
elements.title: As a result of this workshop, I feel confident about the computer science concepts I need to master before teaching CS Discoveries next week.

elements.name: find_resources_m56
elements.title: I know where to find resources to help me teach the units we have covered.

elements.name: barriers_m56
elements.title: I have identified the barriers keeping students from feeling included in CS education at my school.

elements.name: strategies_ensure_inclusion_m56
elements.title: This workshop provided me with new ideas and strategies to ensure that my classroom fosters a sense of belonging.

elements.name: plan_develop_m56
elements.title: I am committed to implementing a plan to differentiate teaching during units 7 and 8.

elements.name: plan_measure_m56
elements.visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Principles' and ({regional_partner_name} <> 'Broward County Public Schools' and {regional_partner_name}<>  'Florida International University' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'Orlando Science Center' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'Tampa Bay STEM Network' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'University of North Florida & STEM2 Hub')
elements.title: I feel ready to track the progress of my inclusion plan: I know how and what to measure as outcomes and supports.

elements.name: assess_cpt_m56
elements.title: I am confident I can explain how students will be assessed on content and skills on the Create Performance Task of the AP exam.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: removed by setting visible = false, removing visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Principles',11/15/2023 per PL team - NZM.

elements.name: make_lessons_cpt_m56
elements.title: After attending this workshop, I have strategies to lead my students through the Make lessons in Unit 7 to adequately prepare them for the Create Performance Task.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: removed by setting visible = false, removing visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Principles',11/15/2023 per PL team - NZM.

elements.name: troublepoints_cpt_m56
elements.title: Through my participation in this workshop, I feel prepared to support my students for the AP Exam’s Create Performance Task by identifying potential trouble points in their project ideas.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: removed by setting visible = false, removing visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Principles',11/15/2023 per PL team - NZM.

elements.name: mvp_cpt_m56
elements.title: I am confident I can help students keep their projects within the scope of the Create Performance Task while defining project ideas that fit the criteria of a minimum viable product.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: removed by setting visible = false, removing visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Principles',11/15/2023 per PL team - NZM.

elements.name: learning_in_context_m56
elements.title: After attending this workshop I feel prepared to incorporate strategies to promote learning through creation in my CS classroom.

elements.name: min_stereotype_m56
elements.visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Discoveries'and ({regional_partner_name} <> 'Broward County Public Schools' and {regional_partner_name}<>  'Florida International University' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'Orlando Science Center' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'Tampa Bay STEM Network' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'University of North Florida & STEM2 Hub')
elements.title: As a result of this workshop, I want to implement strategies to minimize stereotype threats in my classroom (e.g. present role models from diverse groups, promote a growth mindset about intelligence, support students’ sense of belonging, create fair tests, convey high standards and assure students of their ability to meet them).

elements.name: unit6_level_types_m56
elements.title: I recognize different lesson level types and how to use each of them to support Unit 6 instruction.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: added 11/22/2023, before it was in AYW4 - NZM.

elements.name: problem_solve_proc_prog_m56
elements.title: Through this workshop, I feel prepared to use the Problem Solving Process for Programming to reinforce persistence and support students when facing challenges.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: added 11/22/2023, before it was in AYW4 - NZM.

elements.name: differentiation_m56
elements.title: After attending this workshop I understand how to apply differentiation strategies when teaching Unit 5.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: removed by setting visible = false, removing visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Discoveries',11/22/2023 per PL team - NZM.

elements.name: data_analysis_m56
elements.title: Through this workshop, I feel ready to guide students in the use of the Problem Solving Process for Data to draw conclusions about data.
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: removed by setting visible = false, removing visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Discoveries',11/22/2023 per PL team - NZM.

elements.name: csdpilot_reflect_role_m56
elements.title: This workshop provided me with the opportunity to reflect on my role in supporting student learning.

elements.name: csdpilot_confidence_ability_support_m56
elements.title: After this workshop, I feel confident in my ability to support student learning during group work, pair programming, and in giving and receiving feedback.
